com.pixolus.meterreading

Interface MeterReadingListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CameraListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MeterReadingActivity

    public interface MeterReadingListener
extends CameraListener
    Implement this interface in your Activity to receive meter reading results from a MeterReadingFragment.

    The MeterReadingFragment reports reading results and state changes by invoking callbacks on the Activity that is was instantiated from. This interface holds all callbacks that you need to implement in your activity to perform meter reading.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onFirstDetection(MeterReadingFragment meterReadingFragment)
      This callback is invoked by the MeterReadingFragment after the first detection of a meter.
      void onScanReadings(MeterReadingFragment meterReadingFragment, List<MeterReadingResult> results, Bitmap image, Metadata metadata)

      • Methods inherited from interface com.pixolus.meterreading.CameraListener

        onCameraReady, onLayoutChanged

    • Method Detail

      • onScanReadings

        void onScanReadings(MeterReadingFragment meterReadingFragment,
                    List<MeterReadingResult> results,
                    Bitmap image,
                    Metadata metadata)
        This callback is invoked by a MeterReadingFragment whenever a meter could be read, a timeout occured, or a user-initiated manual capture is performed.

        You can inspect the metadata parameter to get the reason for this capture event.

        The length of the list provided in the results parameter is equal to the number of counters as configured via MeterReadingFragment.setNumberOfCounters(int), independent of whether all counters could be read or not (e.g. when a timeout occured or the user initiated a manual capture). You should inspect the individual elements of the results to determine whether a counter could actually be read or not (using the MeterReadingResult.status() method).

        Parameters:
        meterReadingFragment - The Fragment that originated the call.
        results - The list of actual results (i.e. metering values).
        image - The bitmap image on which the results were scanned.
        metadata - Additional information about the reading.

      • onFirstDetection

        void onFirstDetection(MeterReadingFragment meterReadingFragment)
        This callback is invoked by the MeterReadingFragment after the first detection of a meter.

        It does not indicate whether the meter could be read or not, only that a first detection has occured. If the counters on the meter could actually be read successfully, the MeterReadingFragment issues a call to onScanReadings(MeterReadingFragment, java.util.List, android.graphics.Bitmap, Metadata) immediately afterwards.

        Parameters:
        meterReadingFragment - The fragment that originated the call.
